actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

specialTraits.description: The mollymawk doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
specialTraits.name: Flyby

specialTraits.description: The mollymawk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.
specialTraits.name: Hold Breath
